Bump, Santon and Legacy continued to work on Rodimus, carefully trying
to slice off the tentacles that surrounded Rodimus almost like a
second skin. Even as they cut some from him, others with tighten and
move, almost as if they were alive.

"It is like they are absorbing somthing from him." Bump said as he worked.

Santon nodded, "Yes. These tendrils are inside of him as well. Cutting
them off is the easy part. Removing the internal ones is what will
require the presiscion."

Legacy looked at Tuscon's sensor readings and tilted his head,
"Interesting." he said quietly.

"What is it?" Santon said, his optics still glued to Rodimus as he and
Bump worked on Rodimus.

"Tuscon's signature. It is as if he has awakened, and yet he has not."

Bump spoke, his small voice thoughtful as he worked, "We don't know
how his enertgies will mix with these alien things." he says, a hint
of disgust in his voice. "If it drops to far or gets too bad pull him
out. We can't loose both of them."

Legacy nodded, "Understood."


*     *     *     *     *

Meanwhile, next door to the medbay in the recharge chambers there were
twin beeps as both Windlord and the female once known as Nightlight
are fully charged and repaired. With a click and a hiss the doors
began to slide open.

(TAG)

Preston
